item.title: SEHET23 Call for Papers at 9:00 AM MDT on Sun, Jul 7, 2023
item.description: SEHET23 Call for Papers PEARC23 Conference Portland, Oregon July 23-27, 2023 https://pearc.acm.org/pearc23/ Sixth Workshop on Strategies for Enhancing HPC Education and Training (SEHET23) The SEHET23 workshop is an ACM SIGHPC Education Chapter coordinated effort aimed at fostering collaborations among the practitioners from traditional and emerging fields to explore strategies to enhance computational, data-enabled and HPC educational needs. Attendees will discuss approaches for developing and deploying HPC training and education, as well as identifying new challenges and opportunities for keeping pace with the rapid pace of technological advances - from collaborative and online learning tools to new HPC platforms.

item.title: BPHTE23 Call for Papers at 9:00 AM EST on Sun, Nov 11, 2023
item.description: BPHTE23 CFP Call for Papers Tenth SC Workshop on Best Practices for HPC Training and Education (BPHTE23) November 12-17, 2023 Held in conjunction with SC23: The International Conference on High Performance Computing, Networking, Storage, and Analysis https://sc23.supercomputing.org/ Since 2014, the Best Practices for HPC Training workshop series at SC has provided a global forum for addressing common challenges and solutions for enhancing HPC training and education, for sharing information through large and small group discussions, and for fostering collaboration opportunities.
